item.title: 测试
item.description: 傅里叶级数 Parserval恒等式 设$f(x+2\pi)=f(x),\forall x\in \R,f$在$[-\pi,\pi]$平方可积，则 $$ \frac {a_0^2}2+ \sum_{n=1}^{+\infty} a_{k}^2+b_k^2=\frac 1\pi \int_{-\pi}^\pi f^2\mathrm{d} x. $$ Case 1: 设$f\in C(\R),$由Weierstrass逼近定理，$\forall \epsilon >0,\exists T_n\text{ s.t. }\sup |f-T_n|<\epsilon,$则 $$ \frac 1{2\pi } \int_{-\pi}^\pi |f-S_n|^2,\mathrm{d} x \leq \frac 1 {2\pi} \int_{-\pi}^\pi |f-T_n|^2,\mathrm{d} x<\epsilon ^2. $$ 而易证$\displaystyle \int_{-\pi}^\pi |f-S_n|^2,\mathrm{d} x$关于$n$单调减，则 $$ \lim_{n\to\infty} \int_{-\pi}^\pi |f-S_n|^2,\mathrm{d} x=0\quad(\Delta _n^2\to 0). $$ Case 2: 若$f$平方可积，则可用连续函数$g$逼近，并使$f(\pi)=f(-\pi)$. Example 设$f,g$以$2\pi$为周期的连续函数，Fourier系数相等，则$f\equiv g$. $f,g$ Fourier系数相等$\implies f-g$ Fourier系数为$0\implies \displaystyle \int_{-\pi}^\pi |f-g|^2,\mathrm{d} x=0$, 而$f,g\in C(\R)$, 则$f-g=0.
